name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anime Girl Moonlight Flower Field: Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the serene beauty of an anime girl in a moonlit flower field with this enchanting live wallpaper for Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This captivating live wallpaper transports you to a magical scene where an anime girl stands in a blooming flower field, bathed in the soft glow of moonlight. The delicate flowers sway in the breeze, creating a peaceful and dreamlike atmosphere that will transform your browsing experience. The stunning visuals and calming colors bring a sense of tranquility and elegance to your screen.

Along with its breathtaking design, this live wallpaper includes useful features to enhance your browsing. It offers a built-in Google search bar for easy access to any site, along with shortcuts to popular websites like YouTube and Twitter. Stay organized with a real-time clock and date display, ensuring you never miss a beat while enjoying the beautiful, peaceful scene. Download now and immerse yourself in this dreamy anime world!
